text:
The United States will defend American interests whenever and wherever necessary.  We will continue to work with our partners and allies to totally crush Radical Islamic Terrorists.
 
###
author: kristina_wong

text: We will remain vigilant against ISIS by aligning global counterterrorism efforts to fight ISIS until it is finally defeated wherever it operates.
author: kristina_wong

text: While on occasion these cowards will resurface, they have lost all prestige and power.  They are losers and will always be losers.
author: kristina_wong

text: To all of the young people on the internet believing in ISIS’s Propaganda, you will be dead if you join.  Think instead about having a great life.
author: kristina_wong

text: ISIS’s loss of territory is further evidence of its false narrative, which tries to legitimize a record of savagery that includes brutal executions, the exploitation of children as soldiers, and the sexual abuse and murder of women and children.
author: kristina_wong

text: Just two years ago, ISIS controlled a vast amount of territory in both Iraq and Syria.  Since then, we have retaken more than 20,000 square miles of land and liberated millions of Syrians and Iraqis from ISIS’s “caliphate.”
author: kristina_wong

text: .@RealDonaldTrump: I am pleased to announce that, together w/our partners in the Global Coalition to Defeat ISIS, incl. the Iraqi Security Forces & the Syrian Democratic Forces, the United States has liberated all ISIS-controlled territory in Syria & Iraq—100% of the “caliphate.”

text:
.@repjimcooper said the number he's hearing for the FY2020 defense budget is $733B, and that the sequestration caps will be lifted. 

(The DOD has asked for $750B, but it's suspected it was a gambit to get to $733B. According to Cooper's remarks, it will work...).
author: kristina_wong

text: Cooper jokes if Bezos gets divorced, there could be "his and hers" space organizations. (Bezos founded Blue Origin).

text: .@CSIS's @ToddHarrisonDC asks @repjimcooper if @RepMikeRogersAL would make a good Air Force Secretary. Cooper jokes about visiting Rogers after Talladega Nights: "It's a different world down there." Harrison retorts, "Says the guy from Tennessee to the guy from Mississippi."
author: kristina_wong

text: Todd is kind of re-asking your question now. :-D
author: kristina_wong

text: Would he support a space-sensor layer? @repjimcooper: "We need to know, the world needs to know what's going on. If something's going on with the planet, it's good to know...I really don't know anyone who's against sensors."
author: kristina_wong

text: .@repjimcooper on defense spending on space: "We have to be able to meet and beat whatever comes at us." Slams OCO, but says spending on space is "chicken feet." It's an absolutely "vital" capability, he says.
author: kristina_wong

text: .@repjimcooper to @rachelkaras' question on Dem support for Trump admin's space force proposals: "Prospects could hardly be brighter...I think we’re on a path here to achieve everyone’s goals."
